project(extern)

set(SOURCES
    json.hpp)

add_library(${PROJECT_NAME}  ${SOURCES})
#get_source_file_property(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS ${SOURCES} COMPILE_FLAGS)
#string (REPLACE "-Wconversion" "-Wno-conversion" CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS ${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS})
SET_SOURCE_FILES_PROPERTIES(${SOURCES} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS "-Wno-conversion")
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(${PROJECT_NAME} PROPERTIES LINKER_LANGUAGE CXX)
